mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SC_AUTH_FILE(COM_CODE, AUTH_TYPE, FILE_NAME, FILE_PATH, AUTH_SEQ) VALUES (#{COM_CODE}, #{AUTH_TYPE}, #{FILE_NAME}, #{FILE_PATH}, #{AUTH_SEQ})

INSERT INTO SC_AUDIT_ITEM_POINT(COM_CODE, AUDIT_ID, AUTH_TYPE, POINT, AUDIT_COMMENT, AUTH_SEQ, REG_COM_USER_IDX, REG_DATE) VALUES (#{COM_CODE}, #{AUDIT_ID}, #{AUTH_TYPE}, #{POINT}, #{AUDIT_COMMENT}, #{AUTH_SEQ}, #{REG_COM_USER_IDX}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT ACI.COM_CODE, CC.COM_NAME, AUTH_TYPE, APPROVE_STATE, APPROVE_DATE, POINT FROM SC_AUTH_COMPANY_INFO ACI INNER JOIN SC_COMPANY_CODE CC ON CC.COM_CODE = ACI.COM_CODE WHERE AUTH_TYPE=#{AUTH_TYPE} and ACI.COM_CODE=#{COM_CODE}

SELECT ACI.COM_CODE, (SELECT COM_NAME FROM SC_COMPANY_CODE CC WHERE CC.COM_CODE = ACI.COM_CODE) AS COM_NAME, ACI.AUTH_TYPE, APPROVE_STATE, TO_CHAR(APPROVE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as APPROVE_DATE, POINT, AF.FILE_NAME, AF.FILE_PATH FROM SC_AUTH_COMPANY_INFO ACI INNER JOIN SC_AUTH_FILE AF ON AF.COM_CODE = ACI.COM_CODE AND AF.AUTH_TYPE = ACI.AUTH_TYPE WHERE ACI.AUTH_TYPE=#{AUTH_TYPE} and ACI.COM_CODE=#{COM_CODE}

SELECT AI.AUDIT_ID, AI.PROVISION, AI.AUDIT_ITEM, AI.AUDIT_DESC, AI.AUDIT_CRITERIA, AI.POINT_CRITERIA, AA.AUTH_TYPE, AA.POINT, AA.AUDIT_COMMENT FROM SC_AUDIT_LABOUR_ITEM AI LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_AUDIT_ITEM_POINT AA ON AA.AUDIT_ID= AI.AUDIT_ID AND AA.COM_CODE = #{COM_CODE} AND AA.AUTH_TYPE = 'LABOUR'
